title: Loots are broken?
body: i cannot redeem any of my stuff in loot! HELP HELP

replies.body: To put it simply, yes it does seem to be broken right now.  :P  We're investigating the issue now and will post updates on the[ pinned thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Z3zIAhas-8417-hextech-crafting-failed-to-redeem).  hang tight!
It's been that way for several hours now, Rito hasn't said anything, not even a notification that they're looking into it.
